Allows an alternate result tag using an attribute.
---
{"component":"my-custom-highlighter"}
---
<vue-component-doc component="another-my-custom-highlighter">Hallo</vue-component-doc>
---
<another-my-custom-highlighter language="html">
  <template v-slot:code>Hallo</template>
  <template v-slot:result>Hallo</template>
</another-my-custom-highlighter>
